author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Watch ABOLISH EVERYTHING and my feature-length doc BOOMERS on Nebula here: https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

Get 40% off an annual subscription to Nebula: https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

A video about postmodernism, how it died, and who killed it.

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.

*Chapters*
00:00 Remember Postmodernism?
03:29 Suspect Number 1: Jordan Peterson
06:18 The Postmodern Panic
15:40 Suspect Number 2: Donald Trump & Elon Musk
24:35 Postmodernism Revisited
36:57 Suspect Number 3: The 2008 Financial Crisis
43:51 What Comes Next?

Watch this video ad and sponsor-free over on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-who-killed-postmodernism

*Blurb*
Remember postmodernism? Just under a decade ago, the term "postmodernism" seemed to be everywhere.

To slightly nerdier commentators on the political right (including Jordan Peterson, James Lindsay, Gad Saad, Dave Rubin, Ben Shapiro, and others), it was a way of warning of
title: Who Killed Postmodernism?
